concept.title: Bring-fowards / bring-backwards Tool
concept.shortdesc: These two tools are represented two adjacent elements with an arrow moving forwards or backwards respectively.

section.p: These tools allow you to alter the order of a selected element(s). With an element selected, a click on either tool, will move the element up and down the document. Elements which appear last in a document appear at the top, and elements at the start appear behind.
The canvas popup menu also allows for one selected item to be either at the beginning or the end of the document.
section.note: SVG draws the items in the order that they appear in the XML document
